doc.field: 0 Addis Ababa June 7 2025 (FMC) – A book titled Dissecting Haile which delves into the life and experiences of the renowned Ethiopian athlete Haile Gebre-Selassie authored by his daughter Melat is set to be released in August of this year. During a media briefing held this morning Melat revealed that she along with her co-author the…
